Package com.doa.engine

Engine Core.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoaCamera
    Represents a camera construct that looks at a certain point in 2D space, this point can be animate.
    DoaEngine
    Responsible for creating and supplying the graphics context used for drawing all created DoaObjects, and updating all created DoaObjects.
    DoaHandler
    Responsible for keeping track of all DoaObjects.
    DoaObject
    Blueprint of all objects that are going to be processed by DoaEngine, all objects that will get updated at every logical frame and will get drawn on the screen must sub-class this class, then it is ensured by DoaEngine that it will be updated and will be drawn on the screen.
    DoaWindow
    Responsible for providing a windowing tool for DoaEngine.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DoaRenderingMode
    Specifies the rendering mode of DoaEngine.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DoaEngineInstanceException
    Thrown when certain DoaEngine parts are tried to be instantiated more than once.
    DoaEngineStateException
    Thrown when DoaEngine is tried to put in an illegal state, such as tried to be run whilst already running.
